```{r}
combined_func <- generate_benchmark_function(
  bases = list("normal", "normal"),  # x^1, x^2, normal, sine
  coefficients = list(
    50,
    50
  ),
  shifts = c(0.3, 0.6),     # Shifts for each basis
  scale_factors = c(10, 10)      # Amplitude factors
)

curve_data <- generate_functional_curves(n = 100,
                           num_points = 100,
                           g = combined_func,
                           warping = "simple",
                           sigma_amplitude = 0.1,
                           scale_factor = 1,
                           nugget = 0.0005)


plot_simulated_curves(curves = curve_data$curves,
                      t_grid = curve_data$t_grid,
                      g = curve_data$base_function)
```


```{r}
t_grid <- curve_data$t_grid
curves <- curve_data$curves

n_lambda <- 5
max_lam <- 2
lambda_values <- seq(0, max_lam, length.out = n_lambda)
sig_threshold <- 0.03
pers_threshold <- 0.28
```


```{r}
ret <- peak_persistance_diagram(curves, t_grid, 1, 5, sig_threshold, pers_threshold)
```
